Level 36
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 36
By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 04:13 am:

Stage 36

This stage is obviously easy but you need timing. All I've got to say is that the ducken will shoot projectiles from time to time, and all you need to do is to create boxes all the way to the top. But make sure you know two things. When you are standing on a box, make ANOTHER box right/left at where the box you are standing on, so that once the ducken attack those boxes, you won't fall as it is not the immediate box in which you stand on. Same for the top, you should make boxes that prevent their projectiles from hitting you once you entered a ducken's sight range. If possible, make one whole string of boxes in which you stand on, so that the duckens can't knock you off, and as well as a whole string of boxes to block off ducken attacks to buy you time. Rinse and repeat, get to the top, get key, win game. Nuff' Said
